Detailed Description

Extents ACE_Task and implements some usefull commands for the Dexterous Grasping System enviroment

Member Function Documentation

virtual int DGSTask::IsAlive (   )  [inline, virtual]
 

IsAlive Prints a Message signaling that is alive. As virtual function can be overwrited by descendant classes to personalize their alive messages

Returns:

Reimplemented in SerialConsole.
